mapper.select: SELECT NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , QCN /* 차수 */ , BASE_LMT_AM /* 기초한도금액 */ , CUT_AM /* 절사단위금액 */ , SGNO_PRC_DSC /* 단수처리구분코드 */ , DDL_YN /* 마감여부 */ , DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} /* 경매일자 */

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_UBD_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS FHS_SRA_UBD_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_UBD_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SEL_SRA_UBD_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.INDV_SEX_C ELSE 0 END) AS AM_UBD_HDCN , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.INDV_SEX_C ELSE 0 END) AS SU_UBD_HDCN
FROM (SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS INDV_SEX_C , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_UBD_FEE, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) AS SRA_UBD_FEE , '1' AS FEE_APL_OBJ_C
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE) AS SRA_UBD_FEE
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) C
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND (A.SEL_STS_DSC = '23' OR A.SEL_STS_DSC = '11') AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
GROUP BY A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT
UNION ALL
SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS INDV_SEX_C , SUM(C.SRA_UBD_FEE) AS SRA_UBD_FEE , '2' AS FEE_APL_OBJ_C
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE) AS SRA_UBD_FEE
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) C
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND (A.SEL_STS_DSC = '23' OR A.SEL_STS_DSC = '11') AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
GROUP BY A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT ) AA

SELECT A.AUC_PRG_SQ , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /*축산중도매인명*/
, B.DONGUP
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGBW ELSE '******' END AS DONGBW /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, A.SRA_SBID_AM , E.SRA_SEL_FEE , E.SRA_ETC_CST , D.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , H.IO_AM_15 , F.SRA_RV_AM , B.TRMN_AMNNO , C.INDV_SEX_C , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGUP || ' ' || B.DONGBW ELSE B.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS ADR /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, NVL(H.IO_AM_15, 0) - NVL(F.SRA_RV_AM, 0) AS NOTPAY
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO AS LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 참가번호 */ , TRMN_AMNNO AS TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인관리번호 */ , SUM(AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM) AS AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM /* 참가보증금 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND DEL_YN = '0' GROUP BY LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO, TRMN_AMNNO) D ON A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = D.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 가축경매참여자번호 */ AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = D.TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인번호 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO , NVL(SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM), 0) + NVL(SUM(B.SRA_SEL_FEE), 0) + NVL(SUM(B.SRA_ETC_CST), 0) AS IO_AM_15 FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C NOT IN ('011') THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ETC_CST FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' /* 1출하자, 2낙찰자 */ GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO) B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO /* 경매일자 */ AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 GROUP BY A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO ) H ON A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = H.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 가축경매참여자번호 */ AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = H.TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인번호 */
INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인관리번호 */
INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C ON A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC /* 축산축종구분코드 */ AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호 */
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C NOT IN ('011') THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ETC_CST FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' /* 1출하자, 2낙찰자 */ GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = E.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND A.AUC_DT = E.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ AND A.OSLP_NO = E.OSLP_NO /* 원표번호 */ AND A.LED_SQNO = E.LED_SQNO /* 원장일련번호 */
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , TRMN_AMNNO , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , SUM(SRA_RV_AM) AS SRA_RV_AM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_MWMN_ADJ WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND DEL_YN = '0' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, TRMN_AMNNO, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT )F ON A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = F.TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인번호 */ AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE F.AUC_OBJ_DSC END /* 대상구분코드 */ AND A.AUC_DT = F.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' /* 판매상태구분코드 */ AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO), A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT A.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , B.TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인관리번호 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /*축산중도매인명*/
, A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , B.DONGUP /* 동이상 주소 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGBW ELSE '******' END AS DONGBW /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /*축산중도매인명*/
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO
, SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO
, E.BIRTH /* 생년월일 */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , E.MCOW_DSC /* 어미구분코드 */ , RTRIM(E.KPN_NO) AS KPN_NO /* kpn번호 */ , E.INDV_SEX_C /* 성별 */ , A.SRA_SBID_AM /* 낙찰가격 */ , NVL(G.SRA_SEL_FEE, 0) + NVL(G.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) AS FEE_AM /* 총매매수수료 */ , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 참가번호관리 */ , C.DONGUP AS FHS_DONGUP , C.DONGBW AS FHS_DONGBW , E.MATIME /* 산차 */ , C.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || C.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.DONGUP || ' ' || C.DONGBW ELSE C.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS ADR /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , OSLP_NO /* 원표번호 */ , LED_SQNO /* 원장일련번호 */ , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C <> '011' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_ETC_CST FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' /* 대상구분 - 1.출하자, 2.낙찰자 */ GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO )G ON A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = G.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = G.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = G.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = G.LED_SQNO , TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS C , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV E
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = C.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = C.FARM_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = E.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = E.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND B.TRMN_AMNNO = #{fhs_id_no} /* 거래인관리번호 */
AND B.SRA_MWMNNM LIKE #{ftsnm}||'%' /* 축산중도매인명 */
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO), A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN ftsnm WHEN LENGTH(ftsnm) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(ftsnm,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(ftsnm) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(ftsnm,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(ftsnm,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(ftsnm) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(ftsnm,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(ftsnm,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(ftsnm) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(ftsnm,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(ftsnm,5,1) END AS ftsnm /*출하자명*/ , B.FTSNM , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , C.BIRTH , C.MATIME , C.MCOW_DSC , C.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO
, RTRIM(C.KPN_NO) AS KPN_NO , A.COW_SOG_WT , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , A.SRA_SBID_AM , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN vhc_drv_caffnm WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,5,1) END AS vhc_drv_caffnm /*수송자명*/ , A.SEL_STS_DSC , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN sra_mwmnnm WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,5,1) END AS sra_mwmnnm /*낙찰자명*/ , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , C.INDV_SEX_C , B.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || B.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , A.SRA_SBID_UPR , B.DONGUP || ' ' || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(B.DONGBW) +1, '*')) AS ADR
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC D ON A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = D.VHC_SHRT_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = #{sel_sts_dsc}
AND C.INDV_SEX_C = #{indv_sex_c}
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
ORDER BY A.AUC_DT, A.AUC_PRG_SQ, B.FHS_ID_NO

SELECT A.TRMN_AMNNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN sra_mwmnnm WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(sra_mwmnnm) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(sra_mwmnnm,5,1) END AS sra_mwmnnm /* 축산도매인명*/ , A.AUC_DT , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , COUNT(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO) AS SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산경매낙찰두수 */ , SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) AS SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SEL_FEE) AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 축산판매수수료 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SHNM) AS SRA_SHNM /* 축산자조금 */ , SUM(C.SRA_ETC_CST) AS SRA_ETC_CST /* 축산기타비용 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SEL_FEE) + SUM(C.SRA_SHNM) + SUM(C.SRA_ETC_CST) AS TOT_FEE , E.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , NVL(D.CSH_RV_AM, 0) AS CSH_RV_AM /* 현금입금금액 */ , NVL(D.CK_RV_AM, 0) AS CK_RV_AM /* 수표입금금액 */ , NVL(D.FTR_AM, 0) AS FTR_AM /* 통장입금금액 */ , NVL(D.ETC_RV_AM, 0) AS ETC_RV_AM /* 기타입금금액 */ , NVL(D.SRA_RV_AM, 0) AS SRA_RV_AM /* 입금금액 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO /* 고객전화번호 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 고객휴대폰 */
, (SUM(C.SRA_SEL_FEE) + SUM(C.SRA_SHNM) + SUM(C.SRA_ETC_CST)) + SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) AS TOT_AM , ((SUM(C.SRA_SEL_FEE) + SUM(C.SRA_SHNM) + SUM(C.SRA_ETC_CST)) + SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM)) - NVL(D.SRA_RV_AM, 0) AS NPAY_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 축산판매수수료 */ , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_SHNM /* 축산자조금 */ , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C <> '011' AND NA_FEE_C <> '090' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_ETC_CST /* 축산기타비용 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' /* 대상구분 - 1.출하자, 2.낙찰자 */ GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO ) C ON A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TRMN_AMNNO , SUM(SRA_RV_AM) AS SRA_RV_AM , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '1' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS CSH_RV_AM , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '2' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS CK_RV_AM , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '3' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS FTR_AM , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '9' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS ETC_RV_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_MWMN_ADJ WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} GROUP BY TRMN_AMNNO ) D ON A.TRMN_AMNNO = D.TRMN_AMNNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_DT = E.AUC_DT AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE E.AUC_OBJ_DSC END AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO AND A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = E.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = E.AUC_OBJ_DSC
, TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO
GROUP BY A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.AUC_DT , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , B.SRA_MWMNNM , B.CUS_MPNO , B.OHSE_TELNO , D.SRA_RV_AM , D.CSH_RV_AM , D.CK_RV_AM , D.FTR_AM , D.ETC_RV_AM , E.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO), A.TRMN_AMNNO

SELECT H.SRA_TR_FEE2 , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , SUBSTRING(C.BIRTH, -6) AS FNBIRTH
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가 이름 */
, C.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || C.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , C.NA_TRPL_C , C.DONGUP
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.DONGBW ELSE '******' END AS DONGBW /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 고객휴대폰 */
, SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , D.INDV_SEX_C , D.BIRTH , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM , F.SRA_SOG_FEE AS SRA_SOG_FEE , NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS SRA_ETC_CST , NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) AS SRA_TRPCS , F.ACD_RVG_AM AS ACD_RVG_AM
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,5,1) END AS VHC_DRV_CAFFNM /* 수송자 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /* 낙찰자 */
, A.COW_SOG_WT
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN G.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,5,1) END AS ACNO_OWNER /* 예금주 */
, A.SEL_STS_DSC
, NVL(F.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) + NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(F.ACD_RVG_AM, 0) AS FHS_TOT_AM
, CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM, 0) - (NVL(F.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) + NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(F.ACD_RVG_AM, 0)) ELSE 0 - (NVL(F.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) + NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(F.ACD_RVG_AM, 0)) END AS TOT_AM
, CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, D.BIRTH)) +1 <= 4 AND A.NA_BZPLC NOT IN ('8808990656199', '8808990656434') THEN 4 ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, D.BIRTH)) +1 END AS MTCN /* 월령 의령=8808990656199 원주=8808990656434 */
, CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR , CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN (C.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR C.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,8) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 13 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,9) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 14 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,10) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 15 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,11) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 16 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,12) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 17 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,13) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 18 THEN SUBSTRING(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,14) || '****' ELSE C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO END ELSE CASE WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,8) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 13 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,9) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 14 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,10) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 15 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,11) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 16 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,12) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 17 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,13) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 18 THEN SUBSTRING(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,14) || '****' ELSE C.SRA_FARM_ACNO END END ELSE CASE WHEN (G.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR G.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,8) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 13 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,9) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 14 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,10) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 15 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,11) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 16 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,12) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 17 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,13) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 18 THEN SUBSTRING(G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,14) || '****' ELSE G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO END ELSE CASE WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,8) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 13 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,9) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 14 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,10) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 15 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,11) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 16 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,12) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 17 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,13) || '****' WHEN LENGTH(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 18 THEN SUBSTRING(G.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,14) || '****' ELSE G.SRA_FARM_ACNO END END END AS SRA_FARM_ACNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.DONGUP || ' ' || C.DONGBW ELSE C.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS ADR /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS ACD_RVG_AM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C NOT IN ('010', '030','040') THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ETC_CST FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO )F ON A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = F.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = F.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = F.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = F.LED_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = E.VHC_SHRT_C
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.OSLP_NO , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO , SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) AS SRA_SBID_AM , SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) + SUM(B.SRA_TR_FEE) AS IO_AM_15 , SUM(B.SRA_TR_FEE) AS SRA_TR_FEE2 FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END * SRA_TR_FEE) AS SRA_TR_FEE FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 GROUP BY A.OSLP_NO , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO ) H ON A.OSLP_NO = H.OSLP_NO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS C , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV D , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS G
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0 AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = C.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = C.FARM_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN A.FHS_ID_NO ELSE A.SOGMN_C END = G.FHS_ID_NO AND (CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN A.FARM_AMNNO ELSE 0 END) = (CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN G.FARM_AMNNO ELSE 0 END)
AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = D.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = D.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND C.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND C.FTSNM = #{ftsnm}
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = #{sel_sts_dsc}
AND A.AUC_PRG_SQ = #{auc_prg_sq}
ORDER BY A.AUC_OBJ_DSC, A.AUC_PRG_SQ, FHS_ID_NO

SELECT A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_PRG_SQ
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가 이름 */
, C.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || C.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , C.NA_TRPL_C , C.DONGUP , C.DONGBW
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 고객휴대폰 */
, SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , D.BIRTH , D.INDV_SEX_C , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM , F.SRA_SOG_FEE AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하자 축산출하수수료 */ , NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS SRA_ETC_CST /* 출하자 축산기타비용 */ , NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , F.ACD_RVG_AM AS ACD_RVG_AM /* 사고적립금 */ , G.FTSNM AS ACNO_OWNER , E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM , B.SRA_MWMNNM , A.COW_SOG_WT , A.SEL_STS_DSC /* 판매상태구분코드 */ , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR , CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN CASE WHEN (C.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR C.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL) THEN C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO ELSE C.SRA_FARM_ACNO END ELSE CASE WHEN (G.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR G.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL) THEN G.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO ELSE G.SRA_FARM_ACNO END END AS SRA_FARM_ACNO , C.DONGUP || ' ' || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(C.DONGBW) +1, '*')) AS ADR , NVL(F.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + (NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) + (NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) + NVL(F.ACD_RVG_AM, 0) AS FHS_TOT_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM, 0) - (NVL(F.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + (NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) + (NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) + NVL(F.ACD_RVG_AM, 0)) ELSE 0 - (NVL(F.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + (NVL(F.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) + (NVL(F.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) + NVL(F.ACD_RVG_AM, 0)) END AS TOT_AM , CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, D.BIRTH)) +1 <= 4 AND A.NA_BZPLC NOT IN ('8808990656199', '8808990656434') THEN 4 ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, D.BIRTH)) +1 END AS MTCN /* 월령 의령=8808990656199 원주=8808990656434 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS ACD_RVG_AM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C NOT IN ('010', '030','040') THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC ='1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ETC_CST FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' /* 1:출하자, 2:낙찰자 */ GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO )F ON A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = F.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = F.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = F.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = F.LED_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = E.VHC_SHRT_C
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS C , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV D , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS G
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = C.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = C.FARM_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN A.FHS_ID_NO ELSE A.SOGMN_C END = G.FHS_ID_NO AND (CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN A.FARM_AMNNO ELSE 0 END) = (CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN G.FARM_AMNNO ELSE 0 END)
AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = D.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = D.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND C.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND C.FTSNM = #{ftsnm}
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = #{sel_sts_dsc}
ORDER BY A.AUC_OBJ_DSC, A.AUC_PRG_SQ, FHS_ID_NO

SELECT A.AUC_PRG_SQ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM
, CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM , D.SRA_SEL_FEE AS SRA_SEL_FEE , D.SRA_SHNM AS SRA_SHNM , NVL(D.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS SRA_ETC_CST , B.RMK_CNTN , B.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || B.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , A.COW_SOG_WT , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR , B.DONGUP || ' ' || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(B.DONGBW) +1, '*')) AS ADR , NVL(D.SRA_SEL_FEE, 0) + NVL(D.SRA_SHNM, 0) + NVL(D.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS TOT_FEE
, CASE WHEN A.SRA_SBID_AM != 0 THEN NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM, 0) - (NVL(D.SRA_SEL_FEE, 0) + NVL(D.SRA_SHNM, 0) + NVL(D.SRA_ETC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) ELSE 0 END AS SBT_PY_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_SHNM , SUM( (CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C <> '011' AND NA_FEE_C <> '090' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS SRA_ETC_CST FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO ) D ON A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = D.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = D.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = D.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = D.LED_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN C ON A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = C.TRMN_AMNNO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO
AND B.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND B.FTSNM = #{ftsnm}
ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ, FHS_ID_NO

SELECT B.VHC_SHRT_C , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN vhc_drv_caffnm WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(vhc_drv_caffnm) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(vhc_drv_caffnm,5,1) END AS vhc_drv_caffnm /* 수송자명*/
, CASE WHEN (NVL(C.TRPCS,0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) > 0 THEN COUNT(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO) ELSE 0 END AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , SUM(NVL(C.TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) AS TRPCS , TRIM(B.VHCNO) AS VHCNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.BRWR_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.BRWR_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS BRWR_MPNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) ) AS TRPCS
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO ) C , TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC B
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = B.VHC_SHRT_C AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
GROUP BY B.VHC_SHRT_C , B.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM , B.VHCNO , B.BRWR_MPNO , C.TRPCS , A.SRA_TRPCS
HAVING SUM(NVL(C.TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) > 0
ORDER BY VHC_SHRT_C

SELECT B.RG_DSC AS RG_DSC /* 등록구분 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C /* 성별 */ , COUNT(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO) AS TOT_HDCN /* 두수 */ , SUM(A.COW_SOG_WT) AS TOT_WT /* 우출하 총 중량 */ , FLOOR(AVG(A.COW_SOG_WT)) AS AVG_WT /* 우출하 평균 중량 */ , SUM(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM) AS LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 응찰하한가 총계 */ , FLOOR(AVG(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM)) AS AVG_PR /* 응찰하한가 평균 */
/* 의령 8808990656199, 곡성 8808990656717, 서산 8808990656694, 괴산증평: 8808990656670, 영천: 8808990656687, 포항: 8808990679549, 영덕울진: 8808990785431, 수원: 8808990656496, 고령성주: 8808990659695 */ , CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN ( CASE WHEN (#{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656199' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656694' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656670' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656687' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990679549' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990785431' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656496' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990659695' ) THEN SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) ELSE SUM(A.SRA_SBID_UPR) END) ELSE SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) END AS SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN ( CASE WHEN (#{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656199' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656694' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656670' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656687' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990679549' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990785431' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656496' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990659695' ) THEN AVG(A.SRA_SBID_AM) ELSE AVG(A.SRA_SBID_UPR) END) ELSE AVG(A.SRA_SBID_AM) END AS SRA_AVG_SBID_UPR /* 축산평균낙찰금액 */ , NVL((CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN ( CASE WHEN (#{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656199' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656694' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656670' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656687' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990679549' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990785431' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990656496' OR #{ss_na_bzplc} = '8808990659695' ) THEN AVG(A.SRA_SBID_AM) ELSE AVG(A.SRA_SBID_UPR) END) ELSE AVG(A.SRA_SBID_AM) END), 0) - NVL(AVG(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM), 0) AS BIGO
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' /* 낙찰건 */ AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC /* 축산축종구분코드 */ AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호 */
GROUP BY B.RG_DSC,B.INDV_SEX_C
ORDER BY B.RG_DSC

SELECT A.INDV_SEX_C AS INDV_SEX_C , FLOOR(A.MAX_SRA_SBID_AM) AS MAX_SRA_SBID_AM , FLOOR(A.MIN_SRA_SBID_AM) AS MIN_SRA_SBID_AM , FLOOR(A.AVG_SRA_SBID_AM) AS AVG_SRA_SBID_AM , A.TOT_SU AS TOT_SU , A.COW_SOG_WT AS COW_SOG_WT , B.FTSNM AS AM_MAX_SRA_MWMNNM , C.FTSNM AS AM_LOWS_SRA_MWMNNM , D.FTSNM AS SU_MAX_SRA_MWMNNM , E.FTSNM AS SU_LOWS_SRA_MWMNNM , G.FTSNM AS NO_MAX_SRA_MWMNNM , H.FTSNM AS NO_LOWS_SRA_MWMNNM , I.FTSNM AS ETC_MAX_SRA_MWMNNM , J.FTSNM AS ETC_LOWS_SRA_MWMNNM , F.TOT_TOT_SU AS TOT_TOT_SU FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MAX(A.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MAX(A.SRA_SBID_AM) END AS MAX_SRA_SBID_AM , CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MIN(A.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MIN(A.SRA_SBID_AM) END AS MIN_SRA_SBID_AM , CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN AVG(A.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE AVG(A.SRA_SBID_AM) END AS AVG_SRA_SBID_AM , COUNT(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO) AS TOT_SU , SUM(A.COW_SOG_WT) AS COW_SOG_WT FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO GROUP BY CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND C.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '6') AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND DD.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '6') GROUP BY CASE WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) B ON A.INDV_SEX_C = B.INDV_SEX_C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND C.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '6') AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND DD.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '6') GROUP BY CASE WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) C ON A.INDV_SEX_C = C.INDV_SEX_C
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND DD.INDV_SEX_C = '2' ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) D ON A.INDV_SEX_C = D.INDV_SEX_C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND DD.INDV_SEX_C = '2' ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) E ON A.INDV_SEX_C = E.INDV_SEX_C
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND DD.INDV_SEX_C = '3' GROUP BY CASE WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' ELSE '4' END ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) G ON A.INDV_SEX_C = G.INDV_SEX_C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND DD.INDV_SEX_C = '3' GROUP BY CASE WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN DD.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' ELSE '4' END ) AND ROWNUM = 1 )H ON A.INDV_SEX_C = H.INDV_SEX_C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND (C.INDV_SEX_C = '0' OR C.INDV_SEX_C > '3') AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MAX(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (DD.INDV_SEX_C = '0' OR DD.INDV_SEX_C > '3') ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) I ON A.INDV_SEX_C = I.INDV_SEX_C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , B.FTSNM || '(' || A.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || A.FARM_AMNNO || ')' AS FTSNM , A.SRA_SBID_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND (C.INDV_SEX_C = '0' OR C.INDV_SEX_C > '3') AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE A.SRA_SBID_AM END = (SELECT CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '2' THEN MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_UPR) ELSE MIN(TT.SRA_SBID_AM) END FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW TT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV DD ON TT.NA_BZPLC = DD.NA_BZPLC AND TT.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = DD.SRA_INDV_AMNNO WHERE TT.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND TT.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND TT.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND TT.DEL_YN = '0' AND TT.LED_SQNO = 1 AND TT.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (DD.INDV_SEX_C = '0' OR DD.INDV_SEX_C > '3') ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) J ON A.INDV_SEX_C = J.INDV_SEX_C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END AS INDV_SEX_C , COUNT(*) AS TOT_TOT_SU FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW AA , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV CC WHERE AA.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AA.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND AA.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AA.DEL_YN = '0' AND AA.LED_SQNO = 1 AND AA.NA_BZPLC = CC.NA_BZPLC AND AA.SRA_SRS_DSC = CC.SRA_SRS_DSC AND AA.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = CC.SRA_INDV_AMNNO GROUP BY CASE WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '1' WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '2' WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '3' WHEN CC.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '1' ELSE '4' END) F ON A.INDV_SEX_C = F.INDV_SEX_C

SELECT SUM(AA.SRA_SBID_AM) - (SUM(AA.SRA_SOG_FEE) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.PRNY_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.NCSS_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_TRPCS ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_PYIVA ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.INJT_AM ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_FED_SPY_AM ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.ACD_RVG_AM ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_SHNM ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.TD_RC_CST ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.MT12_OVR_FEE ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE2 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE3 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.TRU_FEE ELSE 0 END) + NVL(#{fhs_sra_ubd_fee}, 0)) AS YU_FHS_TOT
, SUM(AA.SRA_SBID_AM) + (SUM(AA.SRA_SEL_FEE + CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END)) AS ACRV_AM , SUM(AA.SRA_SBID_AM) + (SUM(AA.SRA_SEL_FEE + CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END)) AS IO_NPAY_AM19 , SUM(AA.SRA_SBID_AM) - SUM(AA.SRA_SOG_FEE + CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS TOT_SOG_AM
, SUM(AA.SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN) AS "SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN" /* 축산경매낙찰두수 */ , SUM(AA.NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN) AS "NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN" /* 축산미출장낙찰두수 */
, SUM(AA.SRA_SBID_AM) AS "SRA_SBID_AM" /* 축산경매낙찰금액 */ , SUM(AA.SRA_SEL_FEE + CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "TOT_FEE" /* 낙찰자 총 수수료 */ , SUM(AA.SRA_SOG_FEE + CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "FEE_SAM" /* 출하자 총 수수료 */ , E.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM AS "AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM" /* 경매참가보증금액 */ , D.SRA_RV_AM AS "SRA_RV_AM" /* 중도매인입금금액 */
, SUM(AA.SRA_SOG_HDCN) AS "SRA_SOG_HDCN" /* 축산출하두수 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SOG_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "FEME_SOG_HDCNTT" /* 축산 암컷 출하두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SOG_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "MALE_SOG_HDCNTT" /* 축산 수컷 출하두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN AA.SRA_SOG_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "NO_SOG_HDCNTT" /* 축산 거세 출하두수 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "FEME_HDCN" /* 축산경매 암컷 낙찰두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "MALE_HDCN" /* 축산경매 수컷 낙찰두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN AA.SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "NO_HDCN" /* 축산경매 거세 낙찰두수 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.YSRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_FEME_HDCN" /* 축산경매 암컷 출장두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.YSRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_MALE_HDCN" /* 축산경매 수컷 출장두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN AA.YSRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_NO_HDCN" /* 축산경매 거세 출장두수 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "NO_FEME_HDCN" /* 축산경매 암컷 미출장두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "NO_MALE_HDCN" /* 축산경매 수컷 미출장두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN AA.NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN ELSE 0 END) AS "NO_NO_HDCN" /* 축산경매 거세 미출장두수 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_FEME_SRA_SBID_AM" /* 암컷축산낙찰금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_MALE_SRA_SBID_AM" /* 수컷축산낙찰금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN AA.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_NO_SRA_SBID_AM" /* 거세축산낙찰금액 */
, SUM(AA.SRA_SOG_FEE) AS "SRA_SOG_FEE" /* 총 출하수수료 */ , SUM(AA.SRA_SEL_FEE) AS "SRA_SEL_FEE" /* 총 판매수수료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SOG_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_FEE" /* 암 출하수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SOG_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE18" /* 수 출하수수료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SEL_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_TR_FEE" /* 암 판매수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SEL_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE19" /* 수 판매수수료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_ETC_CST" /* 암 기타비용 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_ETC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE20" /* 수 기타비용 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.PRNY_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "PRNY_JUG_AM" /* 암 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.PRNY_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE4" /* 수 임신감정료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.NCSS_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "NCSS_JUG_AM" /* 암 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.NCSS_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE5" /* 수 괴사감정료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_TRPCS ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_TRPCS" /* 암 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_TRPCS ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE6" /* 수 운송비 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_PYIVA ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_PYIVA" /* 암 출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_PYIVA ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE7" /* 수 출자금 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.INJT_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "INJT_AM" /* 암 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.INJT_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE8" /* 수 주사료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_FED_SPY_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_FED_SPY_AM" /* 암 사료대금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_FED_SPY_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE9" /* 수 사료대금 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.ACD_RVG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "ACD_RVG_AM" /* 암 사고적립금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.ACD_RVG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE10" /* 수 사고적립금 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SHNM ELSE 0 END) AS "SRA_SHNM" /* 암 축산자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.SRA_SHNM ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE11" /* 수 축산자조금 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.TD_RC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "TD_RC_CST" /* 암 당일접수비용 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.TD_RC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE12" /* 수 당일접수비용 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.MT12_OVR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "MT12_OVR_FEE" /* 암 12개월이상수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.MT12_OVR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE13" /* 수 12개월이상수수료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE1 ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE1" /* 암 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE1 ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE14" /* 수 검진비 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE2 ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE2" /* 암 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE2 ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE15" /* 수 혈통접수비 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE3 ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE3" /* 암 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE3 ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE16" /* 수 제각수수료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.TRU_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "TRU_FEE" /* 암 위탁수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN AA.TRU_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "IO_SRA_FEE17" /* 수 위탁수수료 */
, SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.PRNY_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_PRNY_JUG_AM" /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.PRNY_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "MWMM_FEE_PRNY_JUG_AM" /* 중도매인 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.NCSS_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_NCSS_JUG_AM" /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_TRPCS ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_SRA_TRPCS" /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_PYIVA ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_SRA_PYIVA" /* 출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.INJT_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_INJT_AM" /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_FED_SPY_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_SRA_FED_SPY_AM" /* 사료대금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.ACD_RVG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_ACD_RVG_AM" /* 사고적립금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.SRA_SHNM ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_SRA_SHNM" /* 축산자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.TD_RC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_TD_RC_CST" /* 당일접수비용 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.MT12_OVR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_MT12_OVR_FEE" /* 12개월이상수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE1 ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_IO_SRA_FEE1" /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE2 ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_IO_SRA_FEE2" /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE3 ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_IO_SRA_FEE3" /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' THEN AA.TRU_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "FHS_FEE_TRU_FEE" /* 위탁수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.PRNY_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_PRNY_JUG_AM" /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.NCSS_JUG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_NCSS_JUG_AM" /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_TRPCS ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_SRA_TRPCS" /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_PYIVA ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_SRA_PYIVA" /* 출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.INJT_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_INJT_AM" /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_FED_SPY_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_SRA_FED_SPY_AM" /* 사료대금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.ACD_RVG_AM ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_ACD_RVG_AM" /* 사고적립금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.SRA_SHNM ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_SRA_SHNM" /* 축산자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.TD_RC_CST ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_TD_RC_CST" /* 당일접수비용 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.MT12_OVR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_MT12_OVR_FEE" /* 12개월이상수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_IO_SRA_FEE1" /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE2 ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_IO_SRA_FEE2" /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.IO_SRA_FEE3 ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_IO_SRA_FEE3" /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' THEN AA.TRU_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS "SEL_FEE_TRU_FEE" /* 위탁수수료 */ FROM ( SELECT A.NA_BZPLC AS NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AS AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , A.AUC_DT AS AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , '1' AS FEE_APL_OBJ_C /* 1:출하자, 2:낙찰자 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C AS INDV_SEX_C , COUNT(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO) AS SRA_SOG_HDCN /* 축산출하두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산경매낙찰두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM != '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS YSRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산출장낙찰두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산미출장낙찰두수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SOG_FEE) AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하수수료 */ , 0 AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(C.PRNY_JUG_AM) AS PRNY_JUG_AM /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(C.NCSS_JUG_AM) AS NCSS_JUG_AM /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0)) AS SRA_PYIVA /* 출자금 */ , SUM(C.INJT_AM) AS INJT_AM /* 주사료 */ , SUM(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM) AS SRA_FED_SPY_AM /* 사료대금 */ , SUM(C.ACD_RVG_AM) AS ACD_RVG_AM /* 사고적립금액 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SHNM) AS SRA_SHNM /* 축산자조금 */ , SUM(A.TD_RC_CST) AS TD_RC_CST /* 당일접수비용 */ , SUM(A.MT12_OVR_FEE) AS MT12_OVR_FEE /* 12개월이상수수료 */ , SUM(C.IO_SRA_FEE1) AS IO_SRA_FEE1 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(C.IO_SRA_FEE2) AS IO_SRA_FEE2 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(C.IO_SRA_FEE3) AS IO_SRA_FEE3 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(C.TRU_FEE) AS TRU_FEE /* 위탁수수료 */
, SUM(NVL(C.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(C.ACD_RVG_AM, 0)
+ CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC='22' THEN (NVL(C.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) ELSE 0 END
+ (NVL(C.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0))
+ NVL(C.NCSS_JUG_AM, 0) + NVL(C.PRNY_JUG_AM, 0) + NVL(C.IO_SRA_FEE1, 0) + NVL(C.INJT_AM, 0) + NVL(C.SRA_SHNM, 0) + NVL(C.IO_SRA_FEE2, 0) + NVL(C.IO_SRA_FEE3, 0) + NVL(C.TRU_FEE, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) AS SRA_ETC_CST /* 축산기타비용 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PYIVA /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS ACD_RVG_AM /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS NCSS_JUG_AM /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS PRNY_JUG_AM /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS IO_SRA_FEE1 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS INJT_AM /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SHNM /* 자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS IO_SRA_FEE2 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS IO_SRA_FEE3 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS TRU_FEE /* 위탁수수료 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} /* 경매일자 */ AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' /* 1:출하자, 2:낙찰자 */
GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) C
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
GROUP BY A.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , A.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */
UNION ALL
SELECT A.NA_BZPLC AS NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AS AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , A.AUC_DT AS AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , '2' AS FEE_APL_OBJ_C /* 1:출하자, 2:낙찰자 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C AS INDV_SEX_C , 0 AS SRA_SOG_HDCN /* 축산출하두수 */ , 0 AS SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산경매낙찰두수 */ , 0 AS YSRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산미출장낙찰두수 */ , 0 AS NO_SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산미출장낙찰두수 */ , 0 AS SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , 0 AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하수수료 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SEL_FEE) AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(C.PRNY_JUG_AM) AS PRNY_JUG_AM /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(C.NCSS_JUG_AM) AS NCSS_JUG_AM /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(C.SRA_TRPCS) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , SUM(C.SRA_PYIVA) AS SRA_PYIVA /* 출자금 */ , SUM(C.INJT_AM) AS INJT_AM /* 주사료 */ , 0 AS SRA_FED_SPY_AM /* 사료대금 */ , SUM(C.ACD_RVG_AM) AS ACD_RVG_AM /* 사고적립금액 */ , SUM(C.SRA_SHNM) AS SRA_SHNM /* 축산자조금 */ , 0 AS TD_RC_CST /* 당일접수비용 */ , 0 AS MT12_OVR_FEE /* 12개월이상수수료 */ , SUM(C.IO_SRA_FEE1) AS IO_SRA_FEE1 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(C.IO_SRA_FEE2) AS IO_SRA_FEE2 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(C.IO_SRA_FEE3) AS IO_SRA_FEE3 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(C.TRU_FEE) AS TRU_FEE /* 위탁수수료 */
, SUM(NVL(C.SRA_PYIVA, 0) + NVL(C.ACD_RVG_AM, 0) + NVL(C.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(C.NCSS_JUG_AM, 0) + NVL(C.PRNY_JUG_AM, 0) + NVL(C.IO_SRA_FEE1, 0) + NVL(C.INJT_AM, 0) + NVL(C.SRA_SHNM, 0) + NVL(C.IO_SRA_FEE2, 0) + NVL(C.IO_SRA_FEE3, 0) + NVL(C.TRU_FEE, 0) ) AS SRA_ETC_CST /* 축산기타비용 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PYIVA /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS ACD_RVG_AM /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS NCSS_JUG_AM /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS PRNY_JUG_AM /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS IO_SRA_FEE1 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS INJT_AM /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SHNM /* 자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS IO_SRA_FEE2 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS IO_SRA_FEE3 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS TRU_FEE /* 위탁수수료 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} /* 경매일자 */ AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' /* 1:출하자, 2:낙찰자 */
GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) C
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
GROUP BY A.NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , A.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */
) AA , (SELECT SUM(SRA_RV_AM) AS SRA_RV_AM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_MWMN_ADJ WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND DEL_YN = '0') D
, (SELECT SUM(AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM) AS AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM /* 경매참가보증금액 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND DEL_YN = '0') E
GROUP BY E.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , D.SRA_RV_AM

SELECT A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO AS LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , E.TRMN_AMNNO AS TRMN_AMNNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /*축산중도매인명*/ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ AS AUC_PRG_SQ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , F.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM AS AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , A.SRA_SBID_AM AS SRA_SBID_AM , B.SRA_SOG_FEE AS SRA_SOG_FEE , B.SRA_SEL_FEE AS SRA_SEL_FEE , B.SRA_ACO_IVSAM AS SRA_ACO_IVSAM , B.SRA_ACD_RVGAM AS SRA_ACD_RVGAM , B.SRA_TRPCS AS SRA_TRPCS , B.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE , B.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE , B.SRA_MDCCS AS SRA_MDCCS , B.SRA_INJT_FEE AS SRA_INJT_FEE , B.SRA_SHNM AS SRA_SHNM , B.SRA_PDG_RC_FEE AS SRA_PDG_RC_FEE , B.SRA_RMHN_FEE AS SRA_RMHN_FEE , B.SRA_TRU_FEE AS SRA_TRU_FEE , H.IO_AM_15 AS IO_AM_15 , G.SRA_RV_AM AS SRA_RV_AM , BB.INDV_SEX_C AS INDV_SEX_C , SUBSTR(I.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(I.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS CALF_SRA_INDV_AMNNO
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A
