LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACO_IVSAM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACD_RVGAM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_MDCCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_INJT_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SHNM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PDG_RC_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_RMHN_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRU_FEE
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' AND SRA_TR_FEE <> 0
GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_CALF I ON A.NA_BZPLC = I.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = I.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = I.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = I.OSLP_NO AND 1 = I.RG_SQNO
INNER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , SRA_SRS_DSC , SRA_INDV_AMNNO , INDV_SEX_C FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV
AND INDV_SEX_C = #{indv_sex_c}
) BB ON A.NA_BZPLC = BB.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = BB.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = BB.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NA_BZPLC , TRMN_AMNNO , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC , SUM(SRA_RV_AM) AS SRA_RV_AM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_MWMN_ADJ WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND DEL_YN = '0'
GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , TRMN_AMNNO , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC ) G
ON A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = G.TRMN_AMNNO AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE G.AUC_OBJ_DSC END AND A.AUC_DT = G.AUC_DT
INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO
INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR F ON A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_DT = F.AUC_DT
AND F.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END
AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END
AND A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = F.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = F.TRMN_AMNNO AND F.DEL_YN = '0'
, (SELECT A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO , SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) AS SRA_SBID_AM , SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) + SUM(B.SRA_TR_FEE) AS IO_AM_15 FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END * SRA_TR_FEE) AS SRA_TR_FEE FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO) B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 GROUP BY A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO ) H
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt}
AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = H.TRMN_AMNNO
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO) , A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT B.SRA_SOG_FEE , B.SRA_SEL_FEE , NVL(B.SRA_ACO_IVSAM, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) AS SRA_PYIVA , B.SRA_ACD_RVGAM , NVL(B.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) AS SRA_TRPCS , B.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE , B.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE , B.SRA_MDCCS , B.SRA_INJT_FEE , B.SRA_SHNM , B.SRA_PDG_RC_FEE , B.SRA_RMHN_FEE , B.SRA_TRU_FEE , A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM , A.TD_RC_CST , A.MT12_OVR_FEE , A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , D.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || D.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , D.FARM_AMNNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.DONGUP || ' ' || D.DONGBW ELSE D.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS ADR /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, A.COW_SOG_WT , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가 이름 */
, SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , C.INDV_SEX_C , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR
, SUBSTRING(G.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 12) AS CALF_SRA_INDV_AMNNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /* 농가 이름 */
, NVL((CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END), 0) - (NVL(B.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + (NVL(B.SRA_ACO_IVSAM, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_ACD_RVGAM, 0) + (NVL(B.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_MDCCS, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_INJT_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_SHNM, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_PDG_RC_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_RMHN_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TRU_FEE, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) AS TOT_AM , NVL(B.sra_acd_rvgam, 0) + NVL(B.sra_ncss_jug_fee, 0) + NVL(B.sra_prny_jug_fee, 0) + NVL(B.sra_mdccs, 0) + NVL(B.sra_shnm, 0) + NVL(B.sra_pdg_rc_fee, 0) + NVL(B.sra_rmhn_fee, 0) + NVL(B.sra_tru_fee, 0) + NVL(A.sra_fed_spy_am, 0) + NVL(A.td_rc_cst, 0) + NVL(A.mt12_ovr_fee, 0) AS TOT_FEE , REPLACE(RTRIM(C.KPN_NO), 'KPN', '') AS KPN_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_CALF G ON A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = G.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = G.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = G.OSLP_NO AND 1 = G.RG_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS D , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACO_IVSAM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACD_RVGAM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_MDCCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_INJT_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SHNM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PDG_RC_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_RMHN_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRU_FEE
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END
GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC(+) AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC(+) AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT(+) AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO(+) AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO(+)
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = D.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = D.FARM_AMNNO
AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND D.FTSNM = #{ftsnm}
ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , D.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || D.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , D.FTSNM , D.DONGUP || ' ' || D.DONGBW AS ADR FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_CALF G ON A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = G.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = G.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = G.OSLP_NO AND 1 = G.RG_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS D , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACO_IVSAM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACD_RVGAM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_MDCCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_INJT_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SHNM , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PDG_RC_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_RMHN_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRU_FEE
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0 AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC(+) AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC(+) AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT(+) AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO(+) AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO(+) AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = D.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = D.FARM_AMNNO
AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND D.FTSNM = #{ftsnm}
GROUP BY A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , D.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || D.FARM_AMNNO , D.FTSNM , D.DONGUP || ' ' || D.DONGBW
ORDER BY A.AUC_OBJ_DSC

SELECT B.LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO AS "LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO" , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN brkr_name WHEN LENGTH(brkr_name) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(brkr_name,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(brkr_name) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(brkr_name,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(brkr_name,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(brkr_name) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(brkr_name,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(brkr_name,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(brkr_name) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(brkr_name,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(brkr_name,5,1) END AS brkr_name /*수의사명*/ , SUM(C.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE) AS "SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE" , SUM(C.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE) AS "SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE" , SUM(C.SRA_MDCCS) AS "SRA_MDCCS" , SUM(C.SRA_INJT_FEE) AS "SRA_INJT_FEE" , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE, 0) + NVL(C.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE, 0) + NVL(C.SRA_MDCCS, 0) + NVL(C.SRA_INJT_FEE, 0)) AS "FEE_SAM"
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_TRPL B , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_MDCCS , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_INJT_FEE
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END
GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) C
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO = B.LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO AND B.LVST_MKT_TRPL_DSC = '1'
AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO
AND B.LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO = #{fhs_id_no}
AND B.BRKR_NAME = #{ftsnm}
GROUP BY B.LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO , B.BRKR_NAME ORDER BY LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , '경매' AS IO_TR_TPC_NM , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AS SRA_INDV_DSC , A.AUC_DT , A.OSLP_NO , A.LED_SQNO , A.FHS_ID_NO , A.FARM_AMNNO , A.SOG_NA_TRPL_C , A.VHC_SHRT_C , A.RC_DT , A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.SRA_SRS_DSC , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AS SRA_INDV_EART_NO , A.COW_SOG_WT AS COW_SOG_WT , A.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM AS LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , A.SRA_SBID_UPR , A.SRA_SBID_AM AS SRA_SBID_AM , A.SEL_STS_DSC , A.BRCL_ISP_CTFW_SMT_YN , A.BRCL_ISP_DT , A.LWPR_CHG_NT , A.VACN_DT , A.LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO , A.MT12_OVR_YN , A.PPGCOW_FEE_DSC , A.PRNY_JUG_YN , A.PRNY_YN , A.NCSS_JUG_YN , A.NCSS_YN , A.TRPCS_PY_YN , A.SRA_TRPCS , A.SRA_PYIVA , A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM , A.TD_RC_CST , A.AFISM_MOD_DT , A.PRNY_MTCN , A.AFISM_MOD_CTFW_SMT_YN , A.RMHN_YN , A.SRA_PDMNM , A.SRA_PD_RGNNM , A.RMK_CNTN , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , A.DEL_YN , A.TMS_YN , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , B.MACO_YN AS MACO_YN , C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM , B.DONGUP AS SRA_FARM_DONGUP , B.DONGBW AS SRA_FARM_DONGBW
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,5,1) END AS SRA_FHSNM /* 농장명 */
, B.FTSNM AS SLPL_NA_CLNTNM , B.FHS_ID_NO , D.INDV_SEX_C , D.BIRTH AS SRA_INDV_BIRTH , D.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN , D.SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_NO , REPLACE(RTRIM(D.KPN_NO), 'KPN', '') AS SRA_INDV_KPN_NO , D.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , D.MATIME AS SRA_INDV_MOTHR_MATIME , D.RG_DSC , D.MCOW_DSC AS SRA_INDV_MCOW_BRDSRA_RG_DSC , A.MOD_KPN_NO , B.MACO_YN
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /* 판매자명 */
, E.DONGUP AS DONGUP , E.DONGBW AS DONGBW
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS SRA_FARM_CUS_MPNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO
, E.FRLNO AS FRLNO , E.CUS_RLNO AS CUS_RLNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGUP || ' ' || B.DONGBW ELSE B.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS SOG_DONG /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.DONGUP || ' ' || E.DONGBW ELSE E.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS MWMN_DONG /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC C ON C.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND C.VHC_SHRT_C = A.VHC_SHRT_C
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO
, TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV D
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.LED_SQNO = '1' AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND B.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND B.FHS_ID_NO = A.FHS_ID_NO AND B.FARM_AMNNO = A.FARM_AMNNO
AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = D.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = D.SRA_SRS_DSC
ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC AS NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AS AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT AS AUC_DT , A.FHS_ID_NO AS FHS_ID_NO , A.FARM_AMNNO AS FARM_AMNNO , A.RMK_CNTN AS RMK_CNTN , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_EART_NO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,5,1) END AS SRA_FHSNM , B.DONGUP AS SRA_FARM_DONGUP
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGBW ELSE '******' END AS SRA_FARM_DONGBW /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(B.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS FARM_TELNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGUP || ' ' || B.DONGBW ELSE B.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS ADR /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt}
AND B.FTSNM = #{name}
AND A.LED_SQNO = '1'
AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO LIKE #{sra_indv_amnno}
AND B.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND B.FHS_ID_NO = A.FHS_ID_NO AND B.FARM_AMNNO = A.FARM_AMNNO
ORDER BY SRA_FHSNM

SELECT /*DYNAMIC_KEYWORD*//*+ TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW_VS033.VIEW */ A.NA_BZPLC AS NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AS AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT AS AUC_DT , A.TRMN_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , A.RMK_CNTN AS RMK_CNTN , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_EART_NO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_FHSNM , E.DONGUP AS SRA_FARM_DONGUP , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.DONGBW ELSE '******' END AS SRA_FARM_DONGBW /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 11 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(E.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS FARM_TELNO
, CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.DONGUP || ' ' || E.DONGBW ELSE E.DONGUP || ' ' || '******' END AS ADR /* 동이하마스킹주소 */
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E
WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt}
AND E.SRA_MWMNNM = #{name}
AND A.LED_SQNO = '1'
AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO LIKE #{sra_indv_amnno}
AND A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO
ORDER BY SRA_FHSNM
